distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for trousers fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2019-18898: Fixed a local symlink attack where a rogue tss user
  could have gain ownership of arbitrary files in the system during
  installation/update of the trousers package (bsc#1157651).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: UNIX Symbolic Link (Symlink) Following vulnerability in the trousers package of SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 15 SP1; openSUSE Factory allowed local attackers escalate privileges from user tss to root. This issue affects: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 15 SP1 trousers versions prior to 0.3.14-6.3.1. openSUSE Factory trousers versions prior to 0.3.14-7.1.
